means: 使…向远方延伸，把…延展到远处

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词都含有"远的"之意。
means: distant ： 语意最强，强调距离。
far ： 除特殊情况外，侧重长距离。也可用作引申意义。
remote ： 侧重指离中心地有利的地方很远。

sentence.Network_en: Statistically our chances of being the victims of violent crime are remote.
sentence.Network_cn: 从统计数据来看，我们成为暴力犯罪受害者的可能性微乎其微。

sentence.Network_en: Nichols set off for his remote farmhouse in Connecticut.
sentence.Network_cn: 尼科尔斯动身去他在康涅狄格州的偏僻农舍了。

sentence.Network_en: He reached for the remote control and pressed the "play" button.
sentence.Network_cn: 他伸手拿过遥控器，按下“播放”键。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'far apart'): from Latin remotus 'removed', past participle of removere (see remove)

entry.def: Remote areas are far away from cities and places where most people live, and are therefore difficult to get to.

example.ex: Landslides have cut off many villages in remote areas.
example.tran: 滑坡使边远地区的许多村庄与外界隔绝。

example.ex: ...a remote farm in the Yorkshire dales.
example.tran: 位于约克郡山谷的一个偏僻的农场

entry.def: The remote past or remote future is a time that is many years distant from the present.

example.ex: Slabs of rock had slipped sideways in the remote past, and formed this hole.
example.tran: 在久远的过去，岩石板滑落到周边，从而形成了这个洞。

entry.tran: 关系不紧密的;关系疏远的;相距甚远的
entry.def: If something is remote from a particular subject or area of experience, it is not relevant to it because it is very different.

example.ex: This government depends on the wishes of a few who are remote from the people...
example.tran: 这个政府按照远离民众的少数人的意愿行事。

example.ex: Teenagers are forced to study subjects that seem remote from their daily lives.
example.tran: 青少年被迫学习和他们的日常生活关系不大的学科。

entry.tran: (可能性或机会)渺茫的，微乎其微的
entry.def: If you say that there is a remote possibility or chance that something will happen, you are emphasizing that there is only a very small chance that it will happen.

example.ex: I use a sunscreen whenever there is even a remote possibility that I will be in the sun...
example.tran: 不论何时只要有一点可能暴露在阳光下，我就会用防晒霜。

example.ex: The chances of his surviving are pretty remote.
example.tran: 他生还的机会非常渺茫。

entry.tran: 冷漠的;冷淡的;与人疏远的;清高的
entry.def: If you describe someone as remote, you mean that they behave as if they do not want to be friendly or closely involved with other people.

example.ex: She looked so beautiful, and at the same time so remote.
example.tran: 她相貌如此美丽，同时又如此清高不群。

means.word_mean: 1. a device that can be used to control a machine or apparatus from a distance;

sentences.sentence: "he lost the remote for his TV"
"a hideaway far removed from towns and cities"
"a civilization ten centuries removed from modern times"

auth_sentence.content: The first opportunity we see is in remote control.
auth_sentence.res_content: The first opportunity we see is in remote control.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The first opportunity we see is in remote control.

auth_sentence.content: The work was done by remote control and underwater.
auth_sentence.res_content: The work was done by remote control and underwater.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The work was done by remote control and underwater.

auth_sentence.content: Capital cities tend to be remote for a reason.
auth_sentence.res_content: Capital cities tend to be remote for a reason.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Capital cities tend to be remote for a reason.

stems_affixes.word_buile: mot运动+ive……的→n.动机,目的 adj.发动的,运动的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 远的,遥远的,疏远的,偏僻的,细微的
stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+mot运动+e→动回去→退回去→遥远的
com共同+motion动→大家一起动→动乱
mot运动+ion表名词→n.运动,动;提议,动议
mot运动+ive……的→n.动机,目的 adj.发动的,运动的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 发动机, 电动机,汽车
stems_affixes.word_buile: mot运动+or物器→n.发动机, 电动机,汽车
motor汽车+cycle=cycl圆,环→圆,环[轮胎]占大部分的车→摩托车, 机车
promote[v.促进;提升]+ion表名词→n.促进;提升;创立

stems_affixes.value_cn: [美口]夸张地作为, 表现感情
促动;激励,鼓励,作为……的动机
stems_affixes.word_buile: motive动机,目的+ate表动词→motivate使有动机→推动

means.word_mean: (时间上)遥远的; (亲属关系上)远的

sentences.en: The thing happened in the remote past.
sentences.cn: 这件事发生在遥远的过去。

means.word_mean: 远离的, 遥远的; 偏僻的

sentences.en: At night I like to look at the remote stars in the clear sky.
sentences.cn: 晚上我喜欢观看晴朗的夜空中遥远的星星。

means.word_mean: 冷淡的, 疏远的, 漠不关心的

sentences.en: Her manner was polite but remote.
sentences.cn: 她彬彬有礼, 却十分冷淡。

sentences.en: I'm afraid your chances of success are rather remote.
sentences.cn: 我担心你成功的机会极小。

jushi.english: The thing happened in the remote past.
jushi.chinese: 这件事发生在遥远的过去。

jushi.english: There was a palace there in the remote past.
jushi.chinese: 在很久以前那里曾有一座宫殿。

jushi.english: The memory of a remote day is still fresh in my mind.
jushi.chinese: 很久以前的事,在我脑子里还很清晰。
